name: Que Onda!?
description:
This game was done in the 2017 Global Game Jam. 

The game is an epic challenge between two different musicians that fight each other in order to decide who will become the planet's new ArchMusician and defend the vibrational harmony against the evil forces of Reggaeton and Ghetto Cumbia who want to lead men to brutality, fanaticism and twerking.

Good luck!

https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/que-onda-wavin-alive
